name: Moving Average Crossover
description: Simple trend-following strategy based on moving average crossovers. Generates long signals when fast MA crosses above slow MA, and exit signals when fast MA crosses below slow MA.
author: Platform

parameters.name: ma_type
parameters.description: Type of moving average (SMA or EMA)

parameters.name: confirmation_timeframe
parameters.description: Optional higher timeframe for trend confirmation (e.g., '5m' when trading on '1m')
